description: In Star Stable Online, players adventure through the land of Jorvik accompanied by other players and horses. The game renders player characters, horses, NPCs, and other in-game objects using 3D models and textures applied to those 3D models. The textures give the 3D models the correct colors and appearance.
Some of the textures Star Stable Online uses are saved as PTE, or Pixel Texture, files. These files are saved in a format similar to the Crunch CRN format, except they contain a modified header.
